title: OpenComponents CLI Configuration
description: Configuration file for the OpenComponents CLI tool. Used to configure registries and development settings.

$schema.description: A field for the [JSON schema](https://json-schema.org/) specification

registries.description: List of registry URLs where components will be published. These are the target registries for component deployment.

development.description: Development-specific configuration settings for local development and testing.

fallback.description: Fallback configuration for when components cannot be found in the local registry. Allows specifying a fallback registry URL and optionally using its client library.

url.description: URL of the fallback registry to use when components cannot be found locally.

client.description: Whether to use the fallback registry's oc-client-browser.js for previewing components. Defaults to false.

plugins.description: Plugin mocking configuration for development. Plugins are shared functions that components can use, provided by registries in production.

dynamic.description: Dynamic plugin mocks. Values are file paths to JavaScript modules that export 'register' and 'execute' functions. Use this when you need custom mock behavior.

additionalProperties.description: Path to a JavaScript file that exports register and execute functions

static.description: Static plugin mocks. Values are static strings that will always be returned by the plugin. Use this for simple value mocking.

additionalProperties.description: Static value that the plugin should always return

mocks.description: DEPRECATED: Use development.plugins instead. Development configuration for mocking plugins that would normally be provided by production registries.

additionalProperties.description: Path to a JavaScript file that exports register and execute functions
